alert.note: Alert for Barry; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 9:18PM CDT until August 13 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BARRY AND SOUTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 917 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Monett, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Monett, Aurora, Mount Vernon, Marionville, Verona, Freistatt, Hoberg, Pleasant Ridge, Wheelerville and Madry. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 38 and 46. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
